title: Service Agreement
description: Provision of consulting services for business process optimization including monthly consulting sessions and strategic planning

terms.text: Total contract amount is $120,000 USD to be paid monthly in installments of $10,000 on the 1st of each month. Late payments will incur a fee of 1.5% per month.

Client shall provide necessary documentation and access, make timely payments, and participate in scheduled meetings. Provider shall deliver services as specified, maintain confidentiality, and provide regular progress reports.
Provider shall deliver services as specified, maintain confidentiality, and provide regular progress reports.
This contract shall be governed by the laws of the State of New York. Jurisdiction shall be in New York County, NY. Any disputes shall be resolved through binding arbitration.
Both parties agree to maintain confidentiality of all information shared during the course of this agreement and shall not disclose proprietary information to third parties.
Either party may terminate this agreement with 30 days written notice. Upon termination, all obligations cease except for payment of services rendered and confidentiality clauses.
This agreement shall be effective from February 1, 2024 through February 1, 2025, with automatic renewal unless terminated with 30 days notice.
Each party's liability under this agreement shall be limited to the total amount paid or payable under this contract. Neither party shall be liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.
